Eyes: Must wipe eyes as if mucus or water were in them
FEELING IN EYES AS AFTER VIOLENT WEEPING
Sensation as if she had been looking through too sharp spectacles
EYES FEEL AS IF IN SMOKE
Ciliary neuralgia, pain from eyes to top of head
SENSATION AS IF COLD AIR WAS RUSHING THROUGH EYE
Threatened glaucoma; embolism of arteria centralis retinal
Respiratory: Wheezy cough, with frothy expectoration, containing threads like fine twine; worse, lying down
Feeling as if the uvula is elongated in hysterical patients
Female: Threatened abortion, especially when hemorrhage is DARK AND STRINGY
Menses dark, viscid, too frequent and copious, BLACK AND SLIMY
Uterine hemorrhage; CLOTS WITH LONG STRINGS; worse from least movement
Jerking pain in interior of left breast, as if drawn toward back by means of thread
A bounding feeling, as if something alive in right breast
Modalities: Worse: looking fixedly at an object
Mind: VACILLATING; pleasant mania; sings and laughs
Sudden changes from hilarity to melancholy
Abdomen: OBSTINATE CONSTIPATION due to portal stagnation
SENSATION OF SOMETHING ALIVE IN ABDOMEN, STOMACH, ETC
Abdomen swollen, feeling of something heavy
Back: Sudden feeling of coldness in back as if cold water were thrown over him; icy-cold extremities
Nose: STRINGS OF DARK BLOOD hanging down the nose
Head: Throbs, pulsates, during climacteric; worse during menses
Extremities: Spasmodic contractions and twitchings of single set of muscles
Chorea and hysteria, with great alteration of feeling

name: Crocus sativa
Relationship: Antidote: OPIUM; BELL.Compare: IPEC.; TRILLIUM; PLAT.; CHINA; SABINA.
details: Is a remedy often useful in Hemorrhages that are black and stringy. Tingling in various parts. Chorea and hysterical affections. Frequent and extreme changes in sensations and mental conditions. Anger with violence followed by repentance. LAUGHING mania. Drowsiness and LASSITUDE; better by literary labor.
